name: kick
description: Kick a user from the server.
code:
$suppressErrors
$deletecommand
$if[$isBot[$mentioned[1]]==true;{delete:1}{description:You cannot kick a bot!}{color:RED}]
$if[$isUser [$mentioned[1]]==false;{delete:1}{description:User  not found!}{color:RED}]
$kick[$mentioned[1];$noMentionMessage]
$dm[$mentioned[1];You have been kicked from **$serverName** for: $noMentionMessage]
$embed[{title:User  Kicked}{description:$username[$mentioned[1]] has been kicked!}{color:RED}]
$reaction[âœ…]
